name: react-simple-code-editor
description: Simple no-frills code editor with syntax highlighting

scripts.build: babel src --out-dir lib --ignore '**/__tests__/**' && flow-copy-source -i '**/__tests__/**' src lib
scripts.gh-pages: git branch -D gh-pages; git checkout -b gh-pages && rm -rf dist/ && parcel build example/App.js && git add -f dist/ && git commit -m 'Publish website' && git push -fu origin gh-pages; git checkout master
